biotools.summary: MAmBA is an analysis pipeline to assess m5C in microRNAs following Bisulfite small RNA sequencing. Bisulphite miRNA-seq reveals widespread CpG and non-CpG 5-(hydroxy)methyl-Cytosine in human microRNAs.

bioschemas.name: MAmBA
bioschemas.summary: MAmBA is an analysis pipeline to assess m5C in microRNAs following Bisulfite small RNA sequencing. Bisulphite miRNA-seq reveals widespread CpG and non-CpG 5-(hydroxy)methyl-Cytosine in human microRNAs.
